General.Name: CMR S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: CMR, S.A.B. de C.V. operates restaurants, cafeterias, and bars in Mexico. It operates restaurants under the Wings, La Destilería, Bistro Chapultepec, THE CAPITAL GRILLE, Chili's, Red Lobster, Olive Garden, SALA GASTRONOMICA, Los Almendros, and Sushitto brands. The company was formerly known as Corporación Mexicana de Restaurantes, S.A. de C.V. and changed its name to CMR, S.A.B. de C.V. in April 2006. CMR, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1965 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: No.222, Av. Paseo de la Reforma, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 06600
